title: lol client running super slow
body: for the past few weeks or so the client has been so slow. messaging friends, checking profiles, champ select, post game, queuing for games... idk what triggers it but its painful and i thought it would be fixed but it just ... hasnt been. obviously ive checked my pc temp and ram and cpu usage, ive played other games, ive asked my friends (limited of a sample size as that may be :P) and ive watched streamers. this client issue is throughout oce and its been around probably since the pre-season hit

replies.body:
Yeah its definitely a thing, mine has just started doing it today. a few friends had this issue yesterday also. In game no issues, just the loading of the end game results, starting queues, responding to the "game found" screen, even messaging. It's all laggy.
Hopefully the next patch will fix this!

Happening to me also, I see people in games, but my client is saying queues are unavailable, I get a black screen logging into the client for minutes I reload client sometimes it works sometimes it doesn't. I get these weird characters for users in chat that aren't their usernames.
My league client is totally capoot.

I experience it within the Loot menu, takes forever to select champion/skin shards for re-rolls. Run into the same issue while trying to swap champions in ARAM, pick player icons, select runes, etc. 

There's a distinct delay in launch time into pre-game and post-game menus, where the game has loaded to those menus but are unresponsive/frozen in that initial greyed out launch screen.

Similar checks done on CPU/RAM, DirectX and graphic driver updates - nothing seems to correct the issue. Much like everyone else, the actual League of Legends Game Client runs without any problems outside the norm, seems to just be LeagueClientUx & LeagueClientUxRender
